domain.title: Business Vision
domain.description: What are we doing, where are we going?

subitems.title: Requirements list
subitems.description: Is there a list of requirements that are close to full? At a certain time (such as iterations), the demand should be stable.

subitems.title: Requirements Management
subitems.description: How does demand go from verbal to to-do list? Is there an irregular problem in the middle?

subitems.title: Operational quality
subitems.description: Quality observed during system operation, such as security and ease of use

subitems.title: Evolution quality
subitems.description: Software system structure and quality related to the development process, such as software testability, maintainability, scalability, scalability, etc.

subitems.title: Who are you looking for each problem?
Team members' technical stack and level
How to bring everyone's skill level
subitems.description: Coach, Pairing, Teach

subitems.title: Project-independent technology, who can find 'entertainment' together?
Learn about each stakeholder (Level 1)
subitems.description: As a developer, most of the time there is no direct communication with stakeholders.

subitems.title: Stay in communication with the stakeholders (Level 2)
subitems.description: Proper communication can help the project to work better.

people.title: Cross-team collaboration
people.description: 相关的合作方有哪些，各自的接口人是谁？

subitems.title: What are the relevant partners and who are the respective interfaces?
Team in same project or organizations.
Who is the user? Are we in direct contact with them?
Feedback loop. How does a user's feedback become requirements?

subitems.description: Such as project deadline, milestone, plan (with interation plan)

subitems.title: features's lifecycle
subitems.description: Such as Story card workflow in agile

subitems.title: How to communicate?
subitems.description: Such as IM, Email and agile daily standup, remote meeting, Retro, etc.

process.title: Path to Development
process.description: different organizations have their own special situations, such as the opening of PC ports, network permissions, codebase permissions, etc., which require a certain process.

subitems.title: development machine and network permission preparation and so on
editor and related tool application setup

technology.title: Documentation
technology.description: a good documentation should be versionable.

subitems.description: aims to show the online process of the project in a visual way and optimize the bottleneck problems in the process.
